markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dueling Dance (Fighter)](/Feats.aspx?ID=407) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 151 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Duelist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=58) (Level 14)

**Prerequisites**
[Dueling Parry (Fighter)](/Feats.aspx?ID=367)

**Requirements**
You are wielding only a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.

</column>

---

Using your free hand as pivot and balance, you both attack and defend with your weapon. While you are in this stance, you constantly have the benefits of Dueling Parry.
name: Dueling Dance (Fighter)
requirement: You are wielding only a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.
requirement_markdown: You are wielding only a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.
